summary: The module provides dictionary‑oriented wrappers for pathology stain processing transforms, enabling extraction of specific histology stains and normalization of H&E stained whole‑slide images directly on key‑value data structures used in MONAI pipelines.
business_intent: Facilitate robust preprocessing of digital pathology slides by offering easy‑to‑integrate stain deconvolution and normalization utilities, improving data consistency for downstream AI analysis and diagnostic workflows.
